entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning near noon then changing to periods of snow in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
